title: Goldman Says Venezuela Oil Output May Rise in the Long Term
description: The scope for higher Venezuelan oil output in the long run after the US’s capture of the nation’s leader may eventually pressure global crude prices, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
content: The scope for higher Venezuelan oil output in the long run after the US’s capture of the nation’s leader may eventually pressure global crude prices, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
